meta_description: Capital expenditures (CapEx) are long-term investments in physical assets. This guide defines CapEx for maintenance leaders and explains its strategic impact.
title: What Are Capital Expenditures (CapEx)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Are Capital Expenditures (CapEx)?

image_prompt: A high-angle, wide-shot of a modern, clean manufacturing floor in 2026. Maintenance engineers in high-visibility vests and hard hats are inspecting a large, complex robotic assembly line. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the scale and value of the industrial equipment. Photo-realistic, cinematic quality, no text.
